title: The Secret Files of J. Edgar Hoover
creator_credit: Western International Syndication, Joseph Honig and Jerry Kupcinet
brief_description: All personalities whose actions shaped 20th century America, and all unwitting stars in an infamous production are now revealed for the very first time in “The secret files of J. Edgar Hoover”. Power, fear, influence - serving under 8 presidents, he was accountable to none. Politicians came and went, but Hoover remained, a public servant who died a millionaire.
